verses.verse: O give <S%H3034>thanks<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>; for he is <S%H2896>good<s%>: because his <S%H2617>mercy<s%> endureth for <S%H5769>ever<s%>.
Let <S%H3478>Israel<s%> now <S%H559>say<s%>, that his <S%H2617>mercy<s%> endureth for <S%H5769>ever<s%>.
Let the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H175>Aaron<s%> now <S%H559>say<s%>, that his <S%H2617>mercy<s%> endureth for <S%H5769>ever<s%>.
Let them now that <S%H3373>fear<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>say<s%>, that his <S%H2617>mercy<s%> endureth for <S%H5769>ever<s%>.
I <S%H7121>called<s%> upon the <S%H3050>LORD<s%> in <S%H4712>distress<s%>: the <S%H3050>LORD<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> me, and set me in a large <S%H4800>place<s%>. in distress: Heb. out of distress
The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> is on my side; I will not <S%H3372>fear<s%>: what <S%H6213>can<s%> <S%H120>man<s%> <S%H6213>do<s%> unto me? on: Heb. for me
The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> taketh my part with them that <S%H5826>help<s%> me: therefore shall I <S%H7200>see<s%> my desire upon them that <S%H8130>hate<s%> me.
It is <S%H2896>better<s%> to <S%H2620>trust<s%> in the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> than to put <S%H982>confidence<s%> in <S%H120>man<s%>.
It is <S%H2896>better<s%> to <S%H2620>trust<s%> in the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> than to put <S%H982>confidence<s%> in <S%H5081>princes<s%>.
All <S%H1471>nations<s%> compassed me <S%H5437>about<s%>: but in the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> will I <S%H4135>destroy<s%> them. destroy: Heb. cut them off
They compassed me <S%H5437>about<s%>; yea, they compassed me <S%H5437>about<s%>: but in the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> I will <S%H4135>destroy<s%> them.

They compassed me <S%H5437>about<s%> like <S%H1682>bees<s%>; they are <S%H1846>quenched<s%> as the <S%H784>fire<s%> of <S%H6975>thorns<s%>: for in the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> I will <S%H4135>destroy<s%> them. destroy: Heb. cut down
Thou hast <S%H1760>thrust<s%> <S%H1760>sore<s%> at me that I might <S%H5307>fall<s%>: but the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H5826>helped<s%> me.
The <S%H3050>LORD<s%> is my <S%H5797>strength<s%> and <S%H2176>song<s%>, and is become my <S%H3444>salvation<s%>.

The <S%H6963>voice<s%> of <S%H7440>rejoicing<s%> and <S%H3444>salvation<s%> is in the <S%H168>tabernacles<s%> of the <S%H6662>righteous<s%>: the right <S%H3225>hand<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H6213>doeth<s%> <S%H2428>valiantly<s%>.
The right <S%H3225>hand<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> is <S%H7426>exalted<s%>: the right <S%H3225>hand<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H6213>doeth<s%> <S%H2428>valiantly<s%>.
I shall not <S%H4191>die<s%>, but <S%H2421>live<s%>, and <S%H5608>declare<s%> the <S%H4639>works<s%> of the <S%H3050>LORD<s%>.
The <S%H3050>LORD<s%> hath <S%H3256>chastened<s%> me <S%H3256>sore<s%>: but he hath not given me <S%H5414>over<s%> unto <S%H4194>death<s%>.
<S%H6605>Open<s%> to me the <S%H8179>gates<s%> of <S%H6664>righteousness<s%>: I will <S%H935>go<s%> into them, and I will <S%H3034>praise<s%> the <S%H3050>LORD<s%>:
This <S%H8179>gate<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, into which the <S%H6662>righteous<s%> shall <S%H935>enter<s%>.
I will <S%H3034>praise<s%> thee: for thou hast <S%H6030>heard<s%> me, and art become my <S%H3444>salvation<s%>.
The <S%H68>stone<s%> which the <S%H1129>builders<s%> <S%H3988>refused<s%> is become the <S%H7218>head<s%> stone of the <S%H6438>corner<s%>.
This is the <S%H3068>LORD'S<s%> doing; it is <S%H6381>marvellous<s%> in our <S%H5869>eyes<s%>. the LORD's: Heb. from the LORD
This is the <S%H3117>day<s%> which the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> hath <S%H6213>made<s%>; we will <S%H1523>rejoice<s%> and be <S%H8055>glad<s%> in it.
<S%H3467>Save<s%> now, I <S%H577>beseech<s%> thee, O <S%H3068>LORD<s%>: O <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, I <S%H577>beseech<s%> thee, send now <S%H6743>prosperity<s%>.
<S%H1288>Blessed<s%> be he that <S%H935>cometh<s%> in the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>: we have <S%H1288>blessed<s%> you out of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>.

<S%H410>God<s%> is the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, which hath shewed us <S%H215>light<s%>: <S%H631>bind<s%> the <S%H2282>sacrifice<s%> with <S%H5688>cords<s%>, even unto the <S%H7161>horns<s%> of the <S%H4196>altar<s%>.
Thou art my <S%H410>God<s%>, and I will <S%H3034>praise<s%> thee: thou art my <S%H430>God<s%>, I will <S%H7311>exalt<s%> thee.
O give <S%H3034>thanks<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>; for he is <S%H2896>good<s%>: for his <S%H2617>mercy<s%> endureth for <S%H5769>ever<s%>.
